  • Konstruktordetails

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String surname, long id, String username, String passwordHash)
      Constructor for creating a user object without a specified role. Use this for login or temporary user data that doesn't require role-based logic.
      Parameter:
      firstName - First name of the user.
      surname - Last name of the user.
      id - User ID.
      username - Username used for login.
      passwordHash - Hashed password for authentication.

    • User

      public User(long id, String firstName, String surname, String username, String passwordHash, String role)
      Constructor for creating a fully defined user with role and credentials. Typically used when loading from persistent storage or assigning roles.
      Parameter:
      id - User ID.
      firstName - First name.
      surname - Last name.
      username - Login name.
      passwordHash - Hashed password string.
      role - Role of the user (e.g., "admin", "nurse").

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String plainPassword)
      Checks if the given plain text password matches the stored password hash.
      Parameter:
      plainPassword - The plain text password to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the password matches, otherwise false.
